goal:
Circular Change, which is owned by and is legally a part of Giacomelli media Ltd., is a stakeholder engagement platform (hereafter also: CC or the Platform) focusing
on the Circular Economy. Our fundamental mission is to inform, educate, recognise leaders, interpret
best practice and co-create pioneering case studies in the transition from linear to circular business
models.
The Circular Change Platform was established by Giacomelli Media Ltd (hereafter: Gm), in
cooperation with its international partners, in order to create a competence network to assist in a
successful transition to the Circular Economy, embracing its economic, societal and environmental
dimensions. By doing so we are co-creating the conditions and concrete opportunities for a more sustainable business future. Circular Change is seated in Ljubljana, Slovenia. Goals and activities: to inform, educate, recognize leaders, interpret best practice and
co-create pioneering case studies in the transition from linear to circular business models.
euInitiatives: European Circular Economy Stakeholders Platform, Circular Economy action package, Bioeconomy strategy, EU 2030 Energy Strategy
